headline: BLUE M MECHANICAL CONVECTION OVEN 650°F

specstable:
Manufacturer Blue M
Model POM-206C 1
Maximum Temperature 343 ºC (649 ºF, 616 ºK)
Heat/Cool Controls
Control Type Programmable
Overtemperature Protection YES
Capacity/Volume Box 4.10 cu ft (0.12 cu m)
Chamber Size

Height 20.00 in (50.80 cm)
Chamber Characteristics
Chamber Construction Stainless Steel

External Cooling Air Cooled
Other Information Controller:
Watlow F4 -- Programmable, Up to 256 steps can be programmed into as many as 40 nameable profiles.

Watlow Limit SD-- Over temperature control.
